definitions.definition: To cover or smear with pitch.
To darken ; to blacken ; to obscure .

main_definition: To cover or smear with pitch.
secondary_definitions: To darken ; to blacken ; to obscure .

definitions.definition: ( transitive ) To throw .
( transitive or intransitive , baseball ) To throw (the ball ) toward a batter at home plate.
( intransitive , baseball ) To play baseball in the position of pitcher.
( transitive ) To throw away; discard .
( transitive ) To promote , advertise, or attempt to sell.
examples: He pitched the idea for months with no takers.

definitions.definition: ( transitive ) To deliver in a certain tone or style, or with a certain audience in mind.
examples: At which level should I pitch my presentation?

definitions.definition: ( transitive ) To assemble or erect (a tent ). Also used figuratively.
( intransitive ) To fix or place a tent or temporary habitation; to encamp .
( ambitransitive , aviation or nautical ) To move so that the front of an aircraft or boat goes alternatively up and down .
examples: The typhoon pitched the deck of the ship.

definitions.definition: ( transitive ) To set at an angle , especially a downwards one; to cause to tilt .
( transitive , golf ) To play a short, high, lofty shot that lands with backspin .
examples: The only way to get on the green from here is to pitch the ball over the bunker.

definitions.definition: ( intransitive , cricket ) To bounce on the playing surface.
examples: The ball pitched well short of the batsman.

definitions.definition: ( intransitive , Bristol , of snow ) To settle and build up, without melting .
( intransitive , archaic ) To alight ; to settle; to come to rest from flight.
( with on or upon ) To fix one's choice.
( intransitive ) To plunge or fall; especially, to fall forward; to decline or slope.
examples: The field pitches toward the east.

definitions.definition: ( transitive ) To set , face , or pave (an embankment or roadway) with rubble or undressed stones.
( transitive ) To set or fix (a price or value).
( transitive , card games , slang ) To discard (a card) for some gain.
To attack, or position or assemble for attack.
( brewing ) To add yeast as a step while making beer

definitions.definition: To produce a note of a given pitch.
To fix or set the tone of.

main_definition: ( intransitive ) To produce a note of a given pitch.
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To fix or set the tone of.
